page.title: 16A day in the life of Deryn
page.content: My dad is the first person up,he gets up at 3.00a.m to go on the milk round. i get up at 7.00a.m and go over to the farm.My mum and sister get up at 8.00a.m round about half past we move the sheep to another field,then we weigh the lambs ready to go to the market the next day.Then we go to the Park House Hotel to deliver milk.Then we come home and I do some of my homework,in summer if it's a nice day we carry the kitchen table outside.Then I go down to my cousin Simon's house. After that we go down to Simon's cousins house and make a den,after tea I have a shower and then finish my homework.
